/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings are adorned with vibrant red and yellow signs, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
